Text: NTSB Reviews Most Wanted Safety Recommendations Updates for Advisory National Transportation Safety Board Washington DC May NTSB REVIEWS MOST WANTED SAFETY RECOMMENDATIONS UPDATES FOR Washington DC The National Transportation Safety Board holds a public Board meeting Tuesday May at am at its Board Room and Conference Center LEnfant Plaza SW Washington DC The item on the agenda The Board will review activity related to the items on last years Most Wanted Safety Recommendations list and issue an updated list for The Safety Board established the Most Wanted Safety Recommendations Program in The recommendations placed on this list are selected by the Board as issues for intensified followup and to heighten public awareness of these safety concerns Press Officer Terry Williams Directions to Board Room Front door located on Lower th Street directly below LEnfant Plaza From Metro exit LEnfant Plaza station at th and D Streets escalator walk through shopping mall at CVS store take escalator down one level Board room will be to your left Media Contact This message is delivered to you as a free service from the National Transportation Safety Board you may unsubscribe at any time at registrationregistrationasp An archive of press releases is available at pressrelpressrelhtm Current job opportunities with the NTSB are listed at vacancieslistinghtm For questionsproblems contact
